title: Royal Ballet of Cambodia
summary: The Royal Ballet of Cambodia (Khmer: របាំព្រះរាជទ្រព្យ)  is a dance company of Cambodia, famous for its luxury of costumes,  accessories, gold and silver, accompanied by a beautiful soft dance. It should be criticized that it looks like the dance of the devas, which leads to a higher level of dance, which we can assume as the king of dance.[1]
